description: Amendment 2 - extend closing date. Amendment 1 - attached RFP. See RFP.
full_summary:
### Brokerage Service for Warrants Received

#### Tender Announcement Overview

The Industry Canada, via the Canadian Government procurement program, is issuing an Invitation to Submit Tenders (ITS) for the Brokerage Service for Warrants Received. This Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued in accordance with the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other relevant trade agreements.

#### Tender Details

*   **Reference:** PW-23-01023370 (ISED206241)
*   **Publication Date:** January 26, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023 (14:00:00)
*   **time zone:** Eastern Standard Time (EST)

#### Service Description

Industry Canada invites suppliers to provide brokerage services for warrants received.

#### Solicitation Documents

The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents are available on the Canada Buys (canadabuys@canada.ca) website at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/5755d548c6c718312a0f4d5bd0f5c57c/rfp_ised206241_-_borkerage_services_for_warrants.pdf

#### Important Reminders

*   The new tender closing date is February 21, 2023 (14:00:00), as outlined in Amendment 2.

#### How to Submit a Tender

To submit a tender, please return your proposal to:

Jordan Kearns, Industry Canada
Contact Information:

Phone: (343) 548-6416
Email: [jordan.Keans\_@ised-isde.gc.ca](mailto:jordan.Kearns@ised-isde.gc.ca)

Note: Suppliers must ensure that their proposals are received by February 21, 2023 (14:00:00) to be considered. Responses received late will not be considered. The proposal must be in English or French, and should be labeled with the reference number PW-23-01023370 (ISED206241).
